name: XWUI Scroll Area Component
description: Custom scrollable area component with custom scrollbar styling. Supports vertical, horizontal, and both scroll orientations with optional scrollbar hiding. Useful for creating custom scrollable containers.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

hideScrollbar.description: Whether to hide the scrollbar while maintaining scroll functionality

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the scroll area

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to display in the scroll area (required)
